Home → Welcome to OSI Batteries

Business to Business Battery Solutions

A full line replacement battery company for over 40 years, OSI Batteries is truly your ONE SOURCE for all your replacement battery needs. We have thousands of replacement batteries for almost any kind of equipment. We support all types of businesses and government agencies in communications, industrial, and medical industries.

Read More...

Featured Brands

Quote Requests

OSI Batteries is a factory direct authorized distributor and value add center for the industries top manufacturers including Enersys. We also import our own line of communication and bar code scanner batteries and accessories. Our in house assembly team is capable of production runs large and small. If you are looking for a large quantity of batteries or if you would like us to beat a competitor's price Request A Quote Today

Wholesale Accounts

OSI Batteries has over 40 years of experience servicing businesses and institutions large and small. Our broad product range helps all of our business customers fulfill their battery needs. We have several purchasing programs available to make purchasing batteries for your entire organization easy. Learn More About Wholesale Accounts...
